bridge-type.label: Glowmarkt API Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge provides access to smart meters exposed by the Glowmarkt API

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: User name
parameter.description: Username for the Glowmarkt API. This is the same as your Bright app login

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password for the Glowmarkt API. This is the same as your Bright app password

parameter.name: persistenceService
parameter.label: Persistence Service
parameter.description: The persistence service to use. It must support the ModifiablePersistenceService interface.

parameter.name: cronSchedule
parameter.label: Update schedule
parameter.description: This is a cron schedule for updating the meter readings.

parameter.name: applicationId
parameter.label: Application ID
parameter.description: The application ID. It should be ok to leave this at the default value.

parameter.name: serverUri
parameter.label: Server URI
parameter.description: URI for the API server endpoint. You should not need to change this.
